**Title:** Can't Make This Up: The Unbelievable Journey of Griselda Blanco (TV Mini-Series)

**Release Year:** 2022

**Genres:** Crime, Drama, Thriller

**Language:** English

**Runtime:** 30 min per episode

**IMDb Rating:** 6.7/10 based on 1065 user reviews

**IMDb Link:** <https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15837600/>

---

**Plot Summary:**

The story follows Griselda Blanco, a Colombian drug lord who became one of the most powerful women in the criminal underworld. She was known as 'La Reina del Marfil,' or 'The Queen of Ivory.' Her business empire included cocaine trafficking, money laundering, and murder. Despite her ruthless reputation, she managed to balance her family life with her dangerous career.

---

* **Directors:** Andrés Baiz
* **Writers:** Ingrid Escajeda, Doug Miro, Ingrid Escajeda, Carlos Bernard, Eric Newman
* **Producers:** Sofía Vergara, Luis Balaguer, Eric Newman, Carolyn Bernstein, Ingrid Escajeda, Doug Miro
* **Main Cast:** Sofía Vergara as Griselda Blanco, Martin Freeman as Joe Conlon, Alan Arkin as Pablo Escobar, Ana de la Reguera as Sandra Avellanet, Richard Cabral as Eleno Ordones, Chris Redd as Det. Jerry Rennert, Aaron Jenkins as Detective Benny Blanco, Jencarlos Canela as Jimmy Rodriguez, Christopher Meloni as Jack Flynn, John Ortiz as Jorge Ochoa, Isabella Gomez as Young Griselda, Raquel Garcia as Maria, Juan Pablo Raba as Daniel Herrera, Matt Lauria as Tomás Landau, Elizabeth Debicki as Judith Magnum
